content.rendered:
We have won the Deloitte Fast 50 award for the fastest-growing company in Central and Eastern Europe, and we are looking for new colleagues to move our project forward with us! Take advantage of the opportunity and become a part of the fast-growing startup FTMO.com. We are looking for a new colleague to join our marketing department.

So what awaits you at FTMO?

  • The core of your responsibility will be to revise all the content of our website & social media. Your work will be viewed by hundreds of thousands of people
  • We will expect you to not only spot the grammar errors but also to fine-tune our text for optimal readability
  • You will oversee everything from social media posts to emails, graphic design, articles, new website features, or even videos

What do we expect from you?

  • Native English speaker with excellent linguistic skills
  • Creative thinker! The content must be professional, juicy, modern and catchy
  • Proven work experience as a content editor or similar role
  • Portfolio of published work
  • Trading experience
  • Hands-on experience with Content Management Systems (WordPress, Figma)
  • Familiarity with SEO and keyword research

And why work for us?

  • You will be working for a fast-growing start-up/fintech, where you will find 130+ motivated people. We’re rather friends than colleagues and we share the same goals.
  • We encourage self-realisation, we’re flexible and open to new ideas. Each of us can influence the project while working on ourselves and move professionally forward.
  • Thanks our working pace, we can assure you that you won’t get bored with us.
  • We will train you on financial markets and all the other related topics so you know our business.
  • Working from home is not a problem (it always depends on the agreement), but we prefer to work in the office – Quadrio offices will make you feel like at home as well.
  • Free snacks and refreshments (both healthy and sweet) are available for everyone in the office.
  • We’ll offer you a Multisport card, feel free to join our FTMO Running club!
  • Providing appropriate HW goes without saying (laptop, 2 monitors, adjustable desk, ergonomic chair). We want to make sure you’ll feel comfortable in our Quadrio offices.
  • Meeting room for poker and board games. Or you can sing karaoke with us.
